source_caption_data.pre_caption: This scenery video consists of a single, static, low-angle shot of the Chicago Cultural Center. The grand, classical-style building, with its stone facade and large arched windows, is viewed from the street level. A taller skyscraper can be seen in the background against an overcast sky.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
